forum.name: updates
forum.description: find out what's new with anylad. feature announcements and bug fix info. thanks all!
forum.latestCommentText: im gonna miss it for sure

thread.title: Video player upgrade & more

comments.text: Hi all! Here's what's new in today's version 178.1 (you're on [version]). Thx everyone & hope you enjoy!
We upgraded the video player to help with some of YouTube's changes! It should now be faster to startup. Does it also fix other video issues you saw? Pls let us know.
Oculus Quest (e.g. via Oculus Link) now gets the Rift instead of Vive controls! You can now also check the detected VR mode & controls on the back of the main help dialog. Thx Gio!
We now better calculate maximum Thing file sizes in order to keep our database snappy for all. If you run into any alerts during saving pls let us know so we can look into it!
sorry to say that video is broken.
monetized vids have broken in embedded mode, thats killed playing most music through the vid plugin.
video broken. youtube loves changing things :(
some videos still work fine for me but yeah the last time i tried using a monitized video i got a 1 hour unskippable add.
